item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-16
item.description: A first look at Microsoftâ€™s new Windows 11 Android apps support (3 minute read) Microsoft has released the first preview of its Android app support in Windows 11 to testers in the Windows Insider program.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-18
item.description: The PinePhone Pro brings upgraded hardware to the Linux phone (3 minute read) Pine64 is now taking preorders for the PinePhone Pro, the fastest mainline Linux smartphone on the market.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-18
item.description: Amazon built an Alexa cuckoo clock and wants your help backing new projects like this one (2 minute read) Amazon’s ‘Built It’ program is a Kickstarter-like effort where customers can choose to back a product, and if there is enough support within 30 days, Amazon will build it.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-02
item.description: Apple releases Chrome extension for iCloud passwords (1 minute read) Apple has released iCloud Passwords, an official iCloud Keychain Chrome extension for Windows and Mac.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-18
item.description: DuckDuckGo surpasses 100 million daily search queries for the first time (2 minute read) DuckDuckGo recently recorded more than 100 million user search queries in a day.
